info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued March 18 at 5:34PM CDT until March 18 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Midland/Odessa TX
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Northwestern Reeves County in southwestern Texas... Culberson County in southwestern Texas...
* Until 700 PM CDT.
* At 532 PM CDT, a dust channel was 7 miles west of Plateau, or 9 miles east of Van Horn, moving northeast at 45 mph.
HAZARD...Near zero visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph.
SOURCE...Emergency Management reported less than a quarter mile visibility in the Van Horn area.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* This includes the following highways...Interstate 10 between mile markers 136 and 178, and between mile markers 187 and 191. Interstate 20 between mile markers 0 and 45. US Highway 285 in Reeves County.
Locations impacted include... Plateau, Kent, Pecos, McKittrick Canyon, Pecos Municipal Airport, Lobo, Toyah, Pine Springs, Culberson County Airport, Van Horn, Guadalupe Mountains National Park, Red Bluff, Orla, and Red Bluff Reservoir.
info.instruction:
Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
There is no safe place on a highway when a dust storm hits. Visibility can be lost immediately, making it difficult or impossible to slow down and avoid stopped vehicles. Delay travel, or safely exit the highway before the dust storm arrives.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 7:00 PM CDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 7:00 PM CDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued March 18 at 5:34PM CDT until March 18 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Midland/Odessa TX
info.description:

* Dust Storm Warning for... Northwestern Reeves County in southwestern Texas... Culberson County in southwestern Texas...

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 7:00 PM CDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 7:00 PM CDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
